title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.3 - General hearings provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.3 - General hearings provisions

State Regulations

All provisions of Part 358 of this Title which are not
inconsistent with the specific provisions of this Part shall apply to hearings
conducted under this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-10.3

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
